sections.summary: food service worker with fast food, retail and customer service experience. trained in food safety and handling. also have some sales representative skills. highlights reliable and punctual reliable team worker fast learner cash handling self-motivated comfortable standing for long time periods able to work in fast-paced environment math and language skills able to count daily bank deposit conversant in spanish able to stay busy and focused while on the job restaurant management excellent multi-tasker
